headers.subject: [tosdr:2411] You're responsible for your Amazon account info

html:
If you use any Amazon Service, you are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password and for restricting access to your computer, and you agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account or password.

http://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=footer_cou/181-2068372-6490913?ie=UTF8&nodeId=508088

Because of how broad this is (aka, a user potentially has to accept responsibility for a mistake made by Amazon), I see this as a negative.

Title: Amazon isn't responsible for your account's confidentiality

Topic: governance

Summary: You are responsible for maintain your account's confidentiality. However, you also accept full responsibility for activities that occur under your account or password. So, if Amazon makes a mistake and it is somehow attributed to your account, you are responsible even if you knew nothing and had nothing to do with it. 

Score: 40 (mediocre)

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr

> If you use any Amazon Service, you are responsible for maintaining the 
> confidentiality of your account and password and for restricting access to 
> your computer, and you agree to accept responsibility for all activities 
> that occur under your account or password.


http://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=footer_cou/181-2068372-6490913?ie=UTF8&nodeId=508088

Because of how broad this is (aka, a user potentially has to accept 
responsibility for a mistake made by Amazon), I see this as a negative.

Title: Amazon isn't responsible for your account's confidentiality

Topic: governance

Summary: You are responsible for maintain your account's confidentiality. 
However, you also accept full responsibility for activities that occur 
under your account or password. So, if Amazon makes a mistake and it is 
somehow attributed to your account, you are responsible even if you knew 
nothing and had nothing to do with it.
